name: 72 Desafío: Comparando con sumas y restas
name_original: 72 Desafío: Comparando con sumas y restas
description:
72 Desafío: Comparando con sumas y restas is an educational game developed by ColegioAconcagua. It was originally released in 2022.
You can play 72 Desafío: Comparando con sumas y restas on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
